name: form_field_analyser
description:
Use this function if you are asked to analyze a document or a form. Input: a file path or a URL to the document that needs to be analyzed. Output: an object describing the extracted fields from the document.

Return value:
An object describing the result of the operation.
{
"role": "tool", // Required constant field
"status": "success" | "error",
"fields": "array", // Array of field names
"error_message": "string | null" // Error details if status = 'error'
}

Example function call parameter: { "document": "/home/user/document.docx" }

Example successful response:
{
"role": "tool",
"status": "success",
"fields": [ "name", "date"  ],
"error_message": null
}

Example error response:
{
"role": "tool",
"status": "error",
"fields": [],
"error_message": "The document could not be parsed."
}

document.description: Path to the file or URL of the document to be analyzed.
